com.moppyandroid.main

Class MidiSpinnerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • android.widget.ArrayAdapter<MidiPortInfoWrapper>
        • com.moppyandroid.main.MidiSpinnerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Adapter, Filterable, ListAdapter, SpinnerAdapter, ThemedSpinnerAdapter

    public class MidiSpinnerAdapter
extends ArrayAdapter<MidiPortInfoWrapper>
    List<MidiPortInfoWrapper> adapter for a Spinner that displays the name of each port as a list entry.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface android.widget.Adapter

        IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION

    • Method Detail

      • newInstance

        public static MidiSpinnerAdapter newInstance(Context context,
                                             List<MidiDeviceInfo> infos,
                                             boolean selectInputs,
                                             boolean selectOutputs)
        Constructs a new MidiSpinnerAdapter.
        Parameters:
        context - the context to create the MidiSpinnerAdapter in
        infos - the List of MidiPortInfoWrappers to display
        selectInputs - set to true if input ports should appear in the list, false if not
        selectOutputs - set to true if output ports should appear in the list, false if not
        Returns:
        the newly constructed MidiSpinnerAdapter

      • getIndexOf

        public int getIndexOf(MidiPortInfoWrapper portInfo)
        Gets the index of the first entry for the specified MidiPortInfoWrapper.
        Parameters:
        portInfo - the port to look for
        Returns:
        -1 if not found, otherwise the index

      • addDevice

        public void addDevice(MidiDeviceInfo deviceInfo)
        Adds the relevant ports ports of a MidiDeviceInfo to the dataset if they are not already there.
        Parameters:
        deviceInfo - the parent of the ports to add

      • removeDevice

        public void removeDevice(MidiDeviceInfo deviceInfo)
        Removes all ports with a specific parent MidiDeviceInfo from the dataset.
        Parameters:
        deviceInfo - the parent whose children ports should be removed

      • containsDevice

        public boolean containsDevice(MidiDeviceInfo deviceInfo)
        Checks whether any ports with a specific parent MidiDeviceInfo are present.
        Parameters:
        deviceInfo - the parent to look for
        Returns:
        true if child ports of parent are found, otherwise false
